ygData.subject: Re: Holy Swords only ONE per server? Is this right?
ygData.msgSnippet: The problem with that, is that FOH Guild will have all the great  unique magic weapons in the game since they are the oly one high enough level to attain them.
ygData.messageBody:
The problem with that, is that FOH Guild will have all the great unique
magic weapons in the game since they are the oly one high enough level to
attain them. Think about it.

-Dyce

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Seamus McNeill [SMTP:smcneill@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 5:37 PM
> To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Holy Swords only ONE per server? Is this
> right?
>
> From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
>
> I think they should be unique, or at least only one chance to get the
> sword every two months or so....otherwise everyone would have one
> eventually....or maybe even...one sword per month...if the group
> attempting to get the sword fails..it disappears for the rest of that
> month. That will at least make getting this or that holy sword something
> for great value and fame. Let that paladin's name ring loud and clear
> from the forests of Nektulos to the swamps of Innothule.
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> How many communities do you think join ONElist each day?
> http://www.onelist.com
> More than 1,000!
